casepack.title: Financial Continuity CasePack
casepack.description: Validates month-over-month financial continuity using UMCP kernel invariants. Embeds revenue, expenses, margin, and cash flow as [0,1]^4 coordinates. Seam accounting certifies financial health returns through reporting collapse.

run_intent.notes: 12-month financial continuity validation. Coordinates: c1=revenue_performance, c2=expense_control, c3=gross_margin, c4=cashflow_health. Weights: [0.30, 0.25, 0.25, 0.20]. Targets: revenue=$200k, expenses=$150k, cashflow=$40k.
